statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_calibration;
SELECT equipment_id, calibration_date FROM equipment_calibration ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_calibration WHERE engineer_id = 123;
SELECT equipment_id, calibration_result FROM equipment_calibration WHERE calibration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT engineer_id FROM equipment_calibration WHERE calibration_result = 'pass';
SELECT * FROM equipment_calibration WHERE calibration_result = 'Pass';
SELECT equipment_id, engineer_id FROM equipment_calibration WHERE calibration_result = 'Fail' ORDER BY engineer_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT engineer_id FROM equipment_calibration WHERE calibration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT equipment_id, calibration_date FROM equipment_calibration WHERE engineer_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY calibration_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, calibration_result FROM equipment_calibration WHERE engineer_id = 100 AND calibration_result <> 'Pending' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM equipment_calibrations;
SELECT equipment_id, calibration_result, calibration_date FROM equipment_calibrations WHERE id = 5;
SELECT equipment_name, calibration_frequency FROM equipment WHERE calibration_frequency > 30;
SELECT calibration_date, calibration_result FROM equipment_calibrations ORDER BY calibration_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, calibration_result FROM equipment_calibrations JOIN equipment ON equipment.id = equipment_calibrations.id;
SELECT * FROM equipment_calibrations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT equipment_id, calibration_result FROM equipment_calibrations WHERE calibration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY calibration_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, calibration_frequency FROM equipment WHERE calibration_frequency >= 30 ORDER BY equipment_id;
SELECT count(*), equipment_id FROM equipment_calibrations GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING count(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM equipment_calibrations ec JOIN equipment e ON ec.equipment_id = e.equipment_id WHERE e.calibration_frequency < 60;
SELECT * FROM equipment_calibrations;
SELECT equipment_id, calibration_date, technician_id FROM equipment_calibrations ORDER BY calibration_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, calibration_frequency FROM equipment WHERE calibration_frequency > 6;
SELECT equipment_id, calibration_result FROM equipment_calibrations WHERE equipment_id = 3;
SELECT technician_name, technician_email FROM technicians ORDER BY technician_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_calibrations WHERE calibration_result = 'Passed' ORDER BY calibration_date DESC;

SELECT equipment_name, calibration_date, calibration_result FROM equipment_calibrations INNER JOIN equipment ON equipment_calibrations.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id WHERE calibration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT equipment_name, technician_name FROM equipment_calibrations INNER JOIN equipment ON equipment_calibrations.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id INNER JOIN technicians ON equipment_calibrations.technician_id = technicians.technician_id;

SELECT equipment_name, COUNT(calibration_result) AS total_calibrations FROM equipment_calibrations INNER JOIN equipment ON equipment_calibrations.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id GROUP BY equipment_name HAVING total_calibrations > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT equipment_id, calibration_date FROM equipment_calibrations WHERE calibration_result = 'Failed' ORDER BY calibration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, calibration_date FROM Equipment WHERE calibration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT calibration_result, calibration_date FROM CalibrationRecord WHERE calibration_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY calibration_date DESC;
SELECT technician_name, experience_years FROM Technician WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY technician_name ASC;
SELECT record_id, calibration_date, calibration_notes FROM CalibrationLog WHERE calibration_notes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Equipment INNER JOIN CalibrationRecord ON Equipment.equipment_id = CalibrationRecord.equipment_id WHERE Equipment.calibration_date > '2020-01-01';

SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, Technician.technician_name, CalibrationRecord.calibration_date FROM Equipment, Technician, CalibrationRecord WHERE Equipment.equipment_id = CalibrationRecord.equipment_id AND CalibrationRecord.technician_id = Technician.technician_id ORDER BY CalibrationRecord.calibration_date DESC;

SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, CalibrationRecord.calibration_result FROM Equipment INNER JOIN CalibrationRecord ON Equipment.equipment_id = CalibrationRecord.equipment_id WHERE Equipment.calibration_date < '2021-01-01' AND CalibrationRecord.calibration_result = 'Pass';

SELECT Technician.technician_name, CalibrationLog.calibration_notes FROM Technician INNER JOIN CalibrationLog ON Technician.technician_id = CalibrationLog.technician_id WHERE Technician.experience_years > 5;

SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, Technician.technician_name, CalibrationLog.calibration_notes FROM Equipment INNER JOIN CalibrationRecord ON Equipment.equipment_id = CalibrationRecord.equipment_id INNER JOIN Technician ON CalibrationRecord.technician_id = Technician.technician_id INNER JOIN CalibrationLog ON CalibrationRecord.record_id = CalibrationLog.record_id WHERE Equipment.equipment_name LIKE '%sensor%' AND CalibrationLog.calibration_date = '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, calibration_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY calibration_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, calibration_value FROM Equipment WHERE calibration_value > 100;
SELECT equipment_name, calibration_date FROM Equipment WHERE calibration_date >= '2022-01-01' AND calibration_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, calibration_date, calibration_value FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%calibration%';
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, calibration_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY calibration_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, calibration_date, calibration_value FROM Equipment WHERE calibration_value > 5.0;
SELECT Equipment.equipment_id, Equipment.equipment_name, CalibrationLog.technician_name FROM Equipment JOIN CalibrationLog ON Equipment.equipment_id = CalibrationLog.equipment_id;

SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, CalibrationHistory.calibration_value_before, CalibrationHistory.calibration_value_after FROM Equipment JOIN CalibrationHistory ON Equipment.equipment_id = CalibrationHistory.equipment_id WHERE CalibrationHistory.calibration_value_before < CalibrationHistory.calibration_value_after;
